contest-event.event-date: May 5, 1979 D Midlands Area (Youth Section) Midlands Area (Youth Section) 50 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-youth-section National Youth Brass Band Championships From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Youth Edinburgh Dances Assembly Rooms, Derby 5 bands competed. March 12, 2013, 8:21 p.m. Dec. 1, 2014, 1:43 p.m. 1 Corby Beanfield School Donald Manning 2 Ratby Co-operative Youth Betty Anderson 3 Abraham Darby School Band Colin Jones Unknown Result Havelock Concert Brass J. B. Brown Unknown Result Olney Brass David Greig
